results.title: Acute effects of simvastatin to terminate fast reentrant tachycardia through increasing wavelength of atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia circuit.
results.text_hl: Different simulated models of slow/fast and fast/slow reentry were induced. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ caused inhibitory effects on the slow anterograde conduction (origin of refractoriness) more than on the fast anterograde conduction time, leading to an increase of @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ cycle length, @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ wavelength and termination of slow/fast reentrant @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachyarrhythmia@@@.

citations.NLM: Khori V, Alizadeh AM, Moheimani HR, Zahedi M, Aminolsharieh Najafi S, Shakiba D, Nayebpour M. Acute effects of simvastatin to terminate fast reentrant tachycardia through increasing wavelength of atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia circuit. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2015 Feb;29(1):41-53. PMID: 24990322
